description: To Get Details of All Constraints like PK, FK, UK, CK etc and Generate Constraint Drop and ReCreate Statements
body:
/* =============================================================================================================================================================
-- Script		: GetAllConstraints_PK_FK_UK_CK_with_Drop_ReCreate_Constraint_Statements
-- Description	: To Get Details of All Constraints like 'PRIMARY_KEY_CONSTRAINT', 'FOREIGN_KEY_CONSTRAINT', 'UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT', 'CHECK_CONSTRAINT'
--				  Retrives All Complex Relations like Composite Primary Keys, Foreign Keys And Respective Columns with CASCADE.
--				  Generate Drop and Create Scripts for the Constraints.
-- Server		: Local Server
-- Database		: User Database
============================================================================================================================================================= */
SELECT --
	CTE.CONSTRAINT_NAME,
	CTE.CONSTRAINT_TYPE,
	REPLACE(ISNULL(CTE.[ON_DELETE?], ''), 'NO_ACTION', '') AS "ON_DELETE?",
	REPLACE(ISNULL(CTE.[ON_UPDATE?], ''), 'NO_ACTION', '') AS "ON_UPDATE?",
	ISNULL(CTE.[IS_ENABLED?], '') AS "IS_ENABLED?",
	ISNULL(CTE.[IS_TRUSTED?], '') AS "IS_TRUSTED?",
	'|' AS "||",
	CTE.MAIN_TABLE_SCHEMA,
	CTE.MAIN_TABLE_NAME,
	CASE CTE.CONSTRAINT_TYPE
		WHEN 'PRIMARY_KEY_CONSTRAINT' THEN 'PK: ' + CASE WHEN (CHARINDEX(',', CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS) > 0) THEN '( ' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS + ' )' ELSE CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS END
		WHEN 'FOREIGN_KEY_CONSTRAINT' THEN 'FK: ' + CASE WHEN (CHARINDEX(',', CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS) > 0) THEN '( ' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS + ' )' ELSE CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS END
		WHEN 'UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT' THEN 'UK: ' + CASE WHEN (CHARINDEX(',', CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS) > 0) THEN '( ' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS + ' )' ELSE CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS END
		WHEN 'CHECK_CONSTRAINT' THEN 'CK: ' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS
		ELSE ''
		END AS "MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS",
	CASE WHEN (CTE.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'FOREIGN_KEY_CONSTRAINT') THEN '=>' ELSE '  |' END AS "=>",
	ISNULL(CTE.REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA, '') AS REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA,
	ISNULL(CTE.REFER_TABLE_NAME, '') AS REFER_TABLE_NAME,
	ISNULL('PK: ' + CASE WHEN (CHARINDEX(',', CTE.REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS) > 0) THEN '( ' + CTE.REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS + ' )' ELSE CTE.REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS END, '') AS "REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS",
	'|' AS "|||",
	ISNULL(CASE CTE.CONSTRAINT_TYPE
			WHEN 'FOREIGN_KEY_CONSTRAINT'
				THEN 'FK:: Columns " ' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS + ' " in Table " ' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + CTE.MAIN_TABLE_NAME + ' "'
					+ ' => REFERENCES => ' + 'PK:: Columns " ' + CTE.REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS + ' " in Table " ' + CTE.REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + CTE.REFER_TABLE_NAME + ' "'
			ELSE NULL
			END, '') AS "PRIMARYKEY_FOREIGNKEY_NOTATION",
	ISNULL(CTE.DROP_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT, '') AS DROP_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT,
	ISNULL(CTE.RECREATE_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT, '') AS RECREATE_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT
FROM
(
	--$BeginRegion: PrimaryKey Constraints and UniqueKey Constraints
	SELECT --
		--$BeginRegion: Get PrimaryKey Constraints and UniqueKey Constraints
		KC.name AS CONSTRAINT_NAME,
		KC.type_desc AS CONSTRAINT_TYPE,
		NULL AS "ON_UPDATE?",
		NULL AS "ON_DELETE?",
		NULL AS "IS_ENABLED?",
		NULL AS "IS_TRUSTED?",
		--'|' AS "||",
		OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(KC.parent_object_id) AS MAIN_TABLE_SCHEMA,
		OBJECT_NAME(KC.parent_object_id) AS MAIN_TABLE_NAME,
		STUFF((SELECT ', ' + C.name
				FROM sys.columns AS C
				INNER JOIN sys.index_columns AS IC ON IC.object_id = C.object_id AND IC.column_id = C.column_id
				WHERE C.object_id = KC.parent_object_id AND IC.index_id = KC.unique_index_id
				ORDER BY IC.key_ordinal ASC FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS,
		--'' AS "=>",
		NULL AS REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA,
		NULL AS REFER_TABLE_NAME,
		NULL AS REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS,
		--$EndRegion: Get PrimaryKey Constraints and UniqueKey Constraints
		--'|' AS "|||",
		--$BeginRegion: Generate PrimaryKey Constraint or UniqueKey Constraint Drop Statements
		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(KC.object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(KC.name) + ''', ''' + KC.type COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + ''') IS NOT NULL'
			+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(KC.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(KC.parent_object_id))
			+ ' DROP CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(KC.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(KC.object_id))
			+ ';'
			AS "DROP_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT",
		--$EndRegion: Generate PrimaryKey Constraint or UniqueKey Constraint Drop Statements
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Generate PrimaryKey Constraint or UniqueKey Constraint ReCreate Statements
		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(KC.object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(KC.name) + ''', ''' + KC.type COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + ''') IS NULL'
			+ ' BEGIN'
				+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(KC.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(KC.parent_object_id))
				+ ' ADD CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(KC.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(KC.object_id))
				+ CASE WHEN KC.type = 'PK' THEN ' PRIMARY KEY' WHEN KC.type = 'UQ' THEN ' UNIQUE' ELSE '' END 
				+ ' ' + (SELECT TOP(1) I.type_desc FROM sys.indexes AS I WHERE I.object_id = KC.parent_object_id AND I.name = KC.name ORDER BY I.type_desc)
				+ ' (' + STUFF((SELECT ', ' + QUOTENAME(C.name) + CASE WHEN IC.is_descending_key = 1 THEN ' DESC' ELSE ' ASC' END
								FROM sys.columns AS C
								INNER JOIN sys.index_columns AS IC ON IC.object_id = C.object_id AND IC.column_id = C.column_id
								WHERE C.object_id = KC.parent_object_id AND IC.index_id = KC.unique_index_id
								ORDER BY IC.key_ordinal ASC FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') + ' )'
				+ ' WITH (' + (SELECT TOP(1) ('PAD_INDEX = ' + CASE WHEN I.is_padded = 1 THEN 'ON' ELSE 'OFF' END
								+ ', ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ' + CASE WHEN I.allow_page_locks = 1 THEN 'ON' ELSE 'OFF' END
								+ ', ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ' + CASE WHEN I.allow_row_locks = 1 THEN 'ON' ELSE 'OFF' END
								+ ', STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = ' + CASE WHEN INDEXPROPERTY(I.object_id, I.name, 'IsStatistics') = 1 THEN 'ON' ELSE 'OFF' END
								+ ', IGNORE_DUP_KEY = ' + CASE WHEN I.ignore_dup_key = 1 THEN 'ON' ELSE 'OFF' END
								+ CASE WHEN I.fill_factor > 0 THEN ', FILLFACTOR = ' + CAST(I.fill_factor AS VARCHAR(3)) ELSE '' END + ');')
								FROM sys.indexes AS I WHERE I.object_id = KC.parent_object_id AND I.name = KC.name ORDER BY I.type_desc)
			+ ' END'
			+ ';'
			AS "RECREATE_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT"
		--$EndRegion: Generate Primary Key Constraint or Unique Key Constraint ReCreate Statements
	FROM sys.key_constraints AS KC
	WHERE OBJECTPROPERTYEX(KC.parent_object_id, 'BaseType') = 'U'
	--$EndRegion: PrimaryKey Constraints and UniqueKey Constraints
	UNION ALL
	--$BeginRegion: Check Constraints
	SELECT --
		--$BeginRegion: Get Check Constraints
		CC.name AS "CONSTRAINT_NAME",
		CC.type_desc AS "CONSTRAINT_TYPE",
		--'|' AS "||",
		NULL AS "ON_UPDATE?",
		NULL AS "ON_DELETE?",
		NULL AS "IS_ENABLED?",
		NULL AS "IS_TRUSTED?",
		OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(CC.parent_object_id) AS "MAIN_TABLE_SCHEMA",
		OBJECT_NAME(CC.parent_object_id) AS "MAIN_TABLE_NAME",
		CC.definition AS "MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS",
		--'' AS "=>",
		NULL AS "REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA",
		NULL AS "REFER_TABLE_NAME",
		NULL AS "REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS",
		--$EndRegion: Get Check Constraints
		--'|' AS "|||",
		--$BeginRegion: Generate Check Constraint Drop Statements
		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(CC.object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(CC.name) + ''', ''' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CC.type COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)) + ''') IS NOT NULL'
			+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(CC.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(CC.parent_object_id))
			+ ' DROP CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(CC.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(CC.object_id))
			+ ';'
			AS "DROP_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT",
		--$EndRegion: Generate Check Constraint Drop Statements
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Generate Check Constraint ReCreate Statements
		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(CC.object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(CC.name) + ''', ''' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CC.type COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)) + ''') IS NULL'
			+ ' BEGIN'
				+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(CC.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(CC.parent_object_id)) + ' WITH NOCHECK'
				+ ' ADD CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(CC.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(CC.object_id))
				+ ' CHECK (' + CC.definition + ')'
				+ ';'
				+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(CC.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(CC.parent_object_id))
				+ ' CHECK CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(CC.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(CC.object_id))
				+ ';'
			+ ' END'
			+ ';'
			AS "RECREATE_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT"
		--$EndRegion: Generate Check Constraint ReCreate Statements
	FROM sys.check_constraints AS CC
	WHERE OBJECTPROPERTYEX(CC.parent_object_id, 'BaseType') = 'U'
	--$EndRegion: Check Constraints
	UNION ALL
	--$BeginRegion: ForeignKey Constraints
	SELECT --
		--$BeginRegion: Get ForeignKey Constraints
		FK.name AS CONSTRAINT_NAME,
		FK.type_desc AS CONSTRAINT_TYPE,
		FK.update_referential_action_desc AS "ON_UPDATE?",
		FK.delete_referential_action_desc AS "ON_DELETE?",
		CASE FK.is_disabled WHEN 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS "IS_ENABLED?",
		CASE FK.is_not_trusted WHEN 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS "IS_TRUSTED?",
		--'|' AS "||",
		OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.parent_object_id) AS MAIN_TABLE_SCHEMA,
		OBJECT_NAME(FK.parent_object_id) AS MAIN_TABLE_NAME,
		STUFF((SELECT ', ' + C.name
				FROM sys.columns AS C
				INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns AS FKC ON C.object_id = FKC.parent_object_id AND C.column_id = FKC.parent_column_id
				WHERE FKC.constraint_object_id = FK.object_id
				ORDER BY FKC.constraint_column_id FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS,
		--'' AS "=>",
		OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.referenced_object_id) AS REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA,
		OBJECT_NAME(FK.referenced_object_id) AS REFER_TABLE_NAME,
		STUFF((SELECT ', ' + C.name
				FROM sys.columns AS C
				INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns AS FKC ON C.object_id = FKC.referenced_object_id AND C.column_id = FKC.referenced_column_id
				WHERE FKC.constraint_object_id = FK.object_id
				ORDER BY FKC.constraint_column_id FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS,
		--$EndRegion: Get ForeignKey Constraints
		--'|' AS "|||",
		--$BeginRegion: Generate ForeignKey Constraint Drop Statements
		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(FK.name) + ''', ''' + FK.type COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + ''') IS NOT NULL'
			+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.parent_object_id))
			+ ' DROP CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(FK.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.object_id))
			+ ';' 
			AS "DROP_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT",
		--$EndRegion: Generate ForeignKey Constraint Drop Statements
		--
		--$BeginRegion: Generate ForeignKey Constraint ReCreate Statements
		'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(FK.name) + ''', ''' + FK.type COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + ''') IS NULL'
			+ ' BEGIN'
				+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.parent_object_id))
				+ ' WITH ' + CASE FK.is_not_trusted WHEN 0 THEN 'CHECK' ELSE 'NOCHECK' END
				+ ' ADD CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(FK.name) --QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.object_id))
				+ ' FOREIGN KEY'
				+ ' (' + STUFF((SELECT ', ' + QUOTENAME(C.name)
								FROM sys.columns AS C
								INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns AS FKC ON C.object_id = FKC.parent_object_id AND C.column_id = FKC.parent_column_id
								WHERE FKC.constraint_object_id = FK.object_id
								ORDER BY FKC.constraint_column_id FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') + ' )'
				+ ' REFERENCES ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.referenced_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.referenced_object_id))
				+ ' (' + STUFF((SELECT ', ' + QUOTENAME(C.name)
								FROM sys.columns AS C
								INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns AS FKC ON C.object_id = FKC.referenced_object_id AND C.column_id = FKC.referenced_column_id
								WHERE FKC.constraint_object_id = FK.object_id
								ORDER BY FKC.constraint_column_id FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') + ' )'
				+ ' ON DELETE ' + CASE FK.delete_referential_action WHEN 1 THEN 'CASCADE' WHEN 2 THEN 'SET NULL' WHEN 3 THEN 'SET DEFAULT' ELSE 'NO ACTION' END
				+ ' ON UPDATE ' + CASE FK.update_referential_action WHEN 1 THEN 'CASCADE' WHEN 2 THEN 'SET NULL' WHEN 3 THEN 'SET DEFAULT' ELSE 'NO ACTION' END
				+ CASE FK.is_not_for_replication WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE ' NOT FOR REPLICATION' END
				+ ';'
				+ ' ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(FK.parent_object_id)) + '.' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.parent_object_id))
				+ CASE FK.is_disabled WHEN 0 THEN ' CHECK' ELSE ' NOCHECK' END + ' CONSTRAINT ' + QUOTENAME(OBJECT_NAME(FK.object_id))
				+ ';'
			+ ' END'
			+ ';'
			AS "RECREATE_CONSTRAINT_STATEMENT"
		--$EndRegion: Generate ForeignKey Constraint ReCreate Statements
	FROM sys.foreign_keys AS FK
	WHERE OBJECTPROPERTYEX(FK.parent_object_id, 'BaseType') = 'U'
	--$EndRegion: ForeignKey Constraints
)
AS CTE
WHERE 1 = 1
	--AND CONSTRAINT_NAME LIKE '%%'
	--AND CONSTRAINT_TYPE IN ('PRIMARY_KEY_CONSTRAINT', 'FOREIGN_KEY_CONSTRAINT', 'UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT', 'CHECK_CONSTRAINT')
	--AND [OnDelete?] IN ('NO_ACTION', 'CASCADE', 'SET_NULL', 'SET_DEFAULT')
	--AND [OnUpdate?] IN ('NO_ACTION', 'CASCADE', 'SET_NULL', 'SET_DEFAULT')
	--AND [IS_ENABLED?] IN ('YES', 'NO')
	--AND [IS_TRUSTED?] IN ('YES', 'NO')
	--AND MAIN_TABLE_SCHEMA LIKE '%%'
	--AND MAIN_TABLE_NAME LIKE '%%'
	--AND MAIN_TABLE_COLUMNS LIKE '%%'
	--AND REFER_TABLE_SCHEMA LIKE '%%'
	--AND REFER_TABLE_NAME LIKE '%%'
	--AND REFER_TABLE_COLUMNS LIKE '%%'
